_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: FriendConnect
author: loki@crazycoder.dev
description:
https://github.com/Androecia/FriendConnect
This egg automates a lot of stuff.

You will still need to configure it for your server and link your Microsoft Accounts.
Customize /home/container/.env and /home/container/test/index.js
startup: npm run test 2>&1 | sed -E '/^\[FriendConnect\s*\] Server Advertisement Error\s*$/{N; s/(.*)/\o033[34m[FALSE ALARM] \o033[0m\o033[33mThe following error message is expected and is safe to ignore:\n\o033[0m/}'

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/
shopt -s dotglob && cp -r FriendConnect/* /mnt/server
